column1: #Text=A few of the comments point to the callousness of the Gulf states, including SA, for not taking in refugees.
#Text=Also true is that the Gulf states, with Saudi Arabia in the lead, are responsible for much of the Syrian crises.
#Text=The same Saudi Arabia that we sell weapons for use in Syria, Yemen and elsewhere.
#Text=One can sympathize with the perspective of fellow Canadians who question why we should be responsible for these, or any, refugees.
#Text=That we have our own problems, including poverty.
#Text=Such a perspective would be valid if Canada, and its western allies, were not meddling in the Middle East.
#Text=Frequently, that involvement has not been helpful to say the least.
#Text=We have directly and indirectly caused or stoked conflicts that created the refugee exodus.
